mapper.select: SELECT PART_NO AS partNo, PART_TITLE AS partTitle, DEPT_CODE AS deptCode, PART_DATE AS partDate, MEM_NO AS memNo, PART_WRITER AS partWriter, PART_CONTENT AS partContent, PART_HITS AS partHits, PART_DEL_YN AS partDelYN, PART_DEL_DATE AS partDelDate FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.PART_DATE DESC) AS NUM, A.* FROM PART_BOARD A WHERE PART_DEL_YN='N' AND DEPT_CODE=#{deptCode} ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PART_BOARD VALUES( #{partNo}, #{partTitle}, #{deptCode}, DEFAULT, #{memNo}, #{partWriter}, #{partContent}, 0, DEFAULT, NULL )
INSERT INTO PART_FILE VALUES( PART_BOARD_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{postNo}, #{origName}, #{chgName}, #{path}, #{size}, DEFAULT )
